name: Shark Magic Combo
text:
You can only use the second, third, and fourth effects of this Skill each once per Duel.
1: You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters with a Level, except Fish monsters.
2: Send 1 "Shark" Fish Monster from your hand and Deck each to the GY. Add 1 "Aqua Jet" from outside your Deck to your hand.
3: Reveal 1 Spell Card to your opponent. Attach 1 card from your hand or GY to an Xyz Monster you control as material.
4: If your opponent controls a card. Add 1 "Armored Xyz" from outside your Deck to your hand, then play 1 "Black Ray Lancer" in face-down Defense Position from outside your Deck (you can change its Battle Position).
